blogPost.excerpt: Nik Sharma wanted a free and simple performance report on his portfolio brands sent to his inbox daily, so we made it for him. Report Cards provides DTC operators a snapshot of their brand's performance daily, weekly and monthly.
blogPost.body: Nik Sharma wanted a free and simple performance report on his portfolio brands sent to his inbox daily, so we made it for him. Report Cards provides DTC operators a snapshot of their brand's performance daily, weekly and monthly.
blogPost.title: Report Cards by Sharma Brands x Tydo - Free automated performance reports for DTC brands
blogPost.author: Blake Robbins

localize.description: Nik Sharma氏は、自分のポートフォリオブランドのパフォーマンスレポートを無料でシンプルに、毎日受信箱に送ってほしいと考えていました。Report Cardsは、DTCオペレーターに、ブランドのパフォーマンスのスナップショットを毎日、毎週、毎月提供しています。
localize.tagline: DTCブランドの無料自動パフォーマンスレポート

localize.description: Nik Sharma希望每天向他的收件箱发送一份关于他所投资品牌的免费且简单的业绩报告，所以我们为他做了这份报告。Report Cards为DTC运营商提供了每日、每周和每月的品牌业绩快照。
localize.tagline: DTC品牌的免费自动性能报告

localize.description: Nik Sharma希望每天向他的收件箱發送一份關於他所投資品牌的免費且簡單的業績報告，所以我們爲他做了這份報告。Report Cards爲DTC運營商提供了每日、每週和每月的品牌業績快照。
localize.tagline: DTC品牌的免費自動性能報告
